messages.title: TORY REVIVAL ON COURSE TO FOIL INDEPENDENCE

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Stand firm against the SNP’s plans
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stand firm against the SNP's plans for another divisive independence referendum
Campaign to rejuvenate Perth city centre
Work to improve broadband and mobile connectivity in rural Perthshire
Fight to strengthen our transport network including better rail links

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Strong voice at the heart of Government
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensure that Perthshire has a strong voice at the heart of Government

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only Ruth Davidson's Conservatives can take on the SNP here

leaflet.personalStatement: You have my guarantee that the Scottish Conservatives will oppose the SNP every step of the way.

images.caption: TORY REVIVAL ON COURSE TO FOIL INDEPENDENCE
YOUR SCOTTISH CONSERVATIVE AND UNIONIST CANDIDATE FOR PERTH AND NORTH PERTHSHIRE DR IAN DUNCAN
